intro: Discover this seductive adventure through the city, where your mission is to win over the 12 most irresistible guys, each with a unique personality guided by their zodiac sign.
description:
In this exciting game of romance and wit, you’ll dive into flirtatious conversations, challenging your ability to read the signs and win each guy's heart. The clock is ticking: you only have 30 days to make them all fall in love.


Game features:

-12 guys, 12 zodiac signs, 12 challenges: Each guy has a personality influenced by his sign. Can you figure out what makes them fall in love and how to connect with them?

-Seductive conversations: Talk to them, get their number, send messages, and plan the perfect date.

-Love meter: Watch your love meter rise or fall based on your choices. Will you be able to fill their hearts before time runs out?

-Different endings: Depending on your decisions, each guy will react uniquely, unlocking passionate or challenging endings.

-Zodiac rituals: As the game progresses, you’ll uncover secret questions and unique challenges tied to their zodiac sign, allowing you to get to know them on a deeper, more personal level.

-30 days for love: The challenge is to win over the 12 guys in just one month! Every conversation, every date matters.


Do you have what it takes to seduce all 12 zodiac guys and become the master of romance?

Find out in this adventure full of passion, humor, and unexpected twists. Love is written in the stars!
